name: Tavily Search
description: Web search via Tavily API. Provides a tavily_search tool that returns structured search results with titles, URLs, snippets, and optional raw content.

apiKey.description: Tavily API key (defaults to TAVILY_API_KEY env var)

searchDepth.description: Search depth: basic (fast) or advanced (thorough). Default: advanced

includeAnswer.description: Include an AI-generated short answer. Default: true

includeRawContent.description: Include raw page content in results. Default: false

timeoutSeconds.description: Timeout in seconds for search requests. Default: 30

includeAnswer.label: Include AI Answer
includeAnswer.help: Tavily generates a short AI summary of the results.

includeRawContent.label: Include Raw Content
includeRawContent.help: Return full page content (increases token usage).

cacheTtlMinutes.label: Cache TTL (minutes)
cacheTtlMinutes.help: How long to cache results. Set 0 to disable.
